cab.content: PFrom Viceroy, Foreign Department, 2bth May 1919,Hi 5 :.V:innb Maio3ty'3 Government,This Document is the Property of.________ 11m.i.iliim ........IMIIHIMiWHT"'"""(Received 7 p.m.)Clear the line.Secret. Afghanistan. Following wireless addressed to all Eastern Stations apparently from Kushk, picked up by Jutogh station, 22nd May : " (R). Pursuant to telegram from Moscow, No. 1473, according to official advice from Kabul, the new Government of Afghanistan is establishing the constitutional regime and endeavouring to rally mountain tribes of Baluchistan with a view to securing an exit to sea and to gain possession of port of Karachi."^ We are giving this to Press with excision of "is establishing constitutional regime " and substitution of " frontier " for " Baluchistan."
